items.sentence: I don\'t think any woman could ever really understand how I feel.
Tom gave Mary everything he had, but she still wasn\'t satisfied.
You have to tell Tom that you won\'t be going to Boston with him.
You know that Tom is still planning to join the team, don\'t you?
You should tell Tom that Mary isn\'t planning on taking pictures.
You\'re the only one who can get Tom to do what needs to be done.
Tom likes to sit on the dock with his feet dangling in the water.
Tom listened to what Mary had to say without showing any emotion.
Tom lives on a farm with his wife, Mary, not too far from Boston.
Tom might not realize what time the meeting is supposed to begin.
Tom isn\'t able to easily distinguish between boredom and hunger.
Is there any place around here where we can get something to eat?
I hired Tom because I thought he was the best person for the job.
Tom and Mary sat across from each other at a table in the corner.
Tom and Mary started dancing as soon as the band started playing.
Tom accidentally shot himself in the foot while cleaning his gun.
Tom always checks to verify that no dyes are in any food he buys.
Tom always orders the same thing when he eats at this restaurant.
Tom sometimes has trouble understanding other people\'s feelings.
Tom thinks it\'s important for Mary to learn how to speak French.
